author: taylor
msg: Fix bug in invoking action not finding portlet, thanks to Michael Lim for finding this one

author: taylor
msg: completed first conversion of a service to a pico component (template locator)
wrote a groovy script for assembling the container to bootstrap the component test
ComponentAssemblyTestCase can be used to base other component unit tests based on assembly

author: jford
msg: Fixed creation of the database vs the test database.
By creating the test database first, the property default.database.url was being overwritten, thus causing the db.create goal to also write to the test database
